@Esdeathtatsumi You are jumping the gun way too early. there is a good chance the ntr guy's gf is his accomplice in all this, which is a common trope in ntr-swinging type of hentai. The work is not completed yet so we could expect one or two twists before it ends.   If Shougo was actually smart he would find a new girl not involved with all that bullshit, but this is not real life. The way I see it this could end in 3 ways.  1) Shougo will accept his role as a cuck and will secretly continue to watch his gf getting fucked while jerking off 2) Shougo will decide to end this swinging lifestyle  but his gf will continue to fuck the ntr guy behind his back 3) Shougo's gf will get pregnant with ntr guy's child but she will trick Shougo to believe it's his child and they will get married all the while ntr guy continues to fuck her
Stop projecting, this is fiction. Besides, why waste time complaining on a work clearly tagged netorare when there are vanilla tagged works? Don't like netorare? Look for vanilla. Simple.
